module.name: barcode4j
module.description: Barcode4J is a flexible generator for barcodes written in Java.
module.detailed: Barcode4J supports a variety of barcode symbologies such as Interleaved 2 of 5, Code 39, Code128, Codabar, EAN-8/13, UPC-E/A and POSTNET.

what.goal: Provide a free barcode package with support for many different symbologies.

module.why: When working with XSL-FO in a business environment, it happens pretty often that you need a barcode. There are a lot of commercial barcode libraries and fonts around, but very few free implementations.
